content: You have entered a circular map. In the following questions, I will tell you what items are on the map, as well as your position and movements. What will you find?

To answer this question, we need to first understand the positions of the items on the map, and then consider the movements you will undergo.

Therefore, your final destination will be a Malinois on the last step in clockwise direction after your movements around the circular path.
